parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description:
The ID of the task configuration.

>  You can call the [CreateCycleTask](~~CreateCycleTask~~) operation to query the IDs of task configurations.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description:
The name of the task. Valid values:

*   **VIRUS\_VUL\_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: virus scan task
*   **IMAGE_SCAN**: image scan task
*   **EMG\_VUL\_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: urgent vulnerability scan task

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   **VIRUS\_VUL\_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: virus scan task
*   **IMAGE_SCAN**: image scan task
*   **EMG\_VUL\_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: urgent vulnerability scan task
